With this loan, she is going to renew her supplies that are sold quicker such as milk, tea, sugar, bouillon cubes, … With the revenues from her sales, Suzanne takes care of the day-to-day needs of her family members. For the future, she would like to diversify her products and services.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items, such as rice, sugar, oil, and soap to resell

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Monsieur Ousmane est un homme agé de 30 qui est un client du Guichet. Il évolue dans le commerce de vetements. il est marié et père de famille; il a une expérience de 7ans dans cet activité. Monsieur Ousmane commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h; il sollicite le prêt d'un montant de 500 000 F pour renforcer son commerce en achetant des habits comme les chemises, pantalons et chemises qu'il expose dans sa cantine pour les revendre à ses clients. Il gere les charges quoditiennes de sa famille et souhaite à l'avenir avoir un grand magasin et augmenter ses revenus pour pouvoir améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en: Mr. Ousmane is a 30-year-old man who is a client at the branch office. He trades in clothing. He is married and a father with seven years of experience in this business. Mr. Ousmane begins his day at 8 AM and finishes at 6 PM. He is requesting this loan in the amount of 500,000 francs to bolster his business by purchasing some clothing, such as shirts and pants, which he displays in his stall to sell to customers. He is managing his family's day-to-day expenses. For the future, he would like to have big store and to increase his revenues to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase ready-to-wear clothing, pants, shirts, and shoes to sell

loans.name: Qimatgul

texts.ru: Киматгул замужняя женщина. Ей 41 год. У нее шестеро детей и она является заботливой матерью. Старший сын Киматгула работает за рубежом, а остальные школьники. Ее муж опытный дехканин, он занимается земледелием. Киматгул имеет только среднее образование. Она добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Киматгул занимается животноводством, она этой деятельности посвятила 10 лет своей жизни. Киматгул любит свое дело и за счет дохода обеспечивает семью. Кредит запрашивает для закупа крупно-рогатого скота с целью дальнейшего откорма и продажи.
texts.en: Qimatgul is a married woman, 41 years old. She has six children and is a caring mother. Her eldest son works outside of the country, and the others are in secondary school. Her husband is an experienced farmer; he grows produce. Qimatgul has only secondary education. She is a kind and hard-working  person. Qimatgul raises animals; she has dedicated 10 years of her life to this business. She likes her work and supports her family thanks to her income. She is requesting a loan to buy cattle for fattening and resale.

loans.use: to buy cattle for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Moustapha

texts.fr: Monsieur Moustapha est pénitencier de profession, il habite dans la commune. Il est marié et père de 2 petits enfants.Moustapha gere les dépenses quotidiennes de sa petite famille, il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 15h de l'après midi. Monsieur Moustapha évolue dans cet profession depuis plus de 5ans. Il sollicite ce crédit d'un montant de 400.000F pour ambélir l'intérieure de sa maison en achetant des meubles comme le lit, les armoirs et des fauteuils. Son principal souhait est de bénéficier des crédit de la mutuelle pour subvenir à tous ses besoins dans l'avenir.
texts.en: Mr. Moustapha works in a prison. He lives in the Commune. He is married and a father of two small children. Moustapha manages the day-to-day expenses of his small family. His day begins at 8 AM and ends at 3 PM. He has been in this profession for over five years. He is requesting this loan of 400,000 francs to furnish his house by purchasing some furniture, such as a bed, dressers, and armchairs. His primary wish is to obtain loans from the 'mutuelle' to meet all his future needs.

loans.use: to purchase furniture, such as a bed, dressers, and armchairs.

loans.name: Mamadou Matar

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou est un homme agé d 36ans qui habite dans les environs du Guichet. Il évolue dans le commerce depuis plus de 10 ans. Il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19H. Mamadou gere une cantine au marché de sa localité; Mamadou est marié et père de famille qui s'occupe des charges des dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille.Il sollicite ce pret d'un montant de 400.000F pour renforcer son commerce de mercerie en achetant des articles comme le ruban, le fil, les boutons, les fermetures etc..il souhaiterait avoir un grand magasin et détenir le monopole dans cet activité.
texts.en:
Mamadou is a 36-year-old man who lives in the vicinity of the branch office. He has been in the retail business for over 10 years. He starts his day at 8 am to finish at 7 pm.

Mamadou manages a stall in the local market. He is married and a father who takes care of his family's daily expenses.

He is requesting a loan amounting to 400,000 francs to bolster his haberdashery business by buying items such as ribbon, yarn, buttons, closures, etc.

He would like to manage a large store and acquire a monopoly over this activity.

loans.use: buy fabrics and haberdashery items for resale

loans.name: Fama

texts.fr:
Madame Fama, âgé de 45 ans mariée et mère d’un enfant de 10 ans s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle est active pendant toute journée. Elle fait de la vente de poulet  de chair, de bijoux et de tissus.
Fama est une cliente nouvellement inscrit à l’IMCEC seulement depuis Mars 2013, elle vient solliciter un crédit de 400000F CFA  pour aller acheter des tissus teints.
Avec les revenus de son activité, Fama peut appuyer son mari dans la gestion de la maison, d’ailleurs c’est elle qui s’occupe de la scolarité de son enfant.
Elle désire avoir une cantine et diversifier son activité en vendant des chaussures et d’autres variétés de tissus.
texts.en:
Fama is 45 years old and married with one child who is ten years of age. She has been a merchant for more than ten years. Fama is very active throughout the day. Her products for sale currently include broiler chickens, jewelry and fabric.

Fama is a newly registered client of IMCEC, and has only been a member since March of 2013. She is seeking a loan of 400,000 FCFA in order to purchase dyed fabrics.

With the income she earns through her business, Fama can help her husband with the daily household expenses. She is also the one who pays for the education fees of their child. Fama hopes to someday open a canteen and expand her business to include the sale of shoes and other varieties of fabric.

loans.use: to purchase broiler chickens, jewelry and fabric.

loans.name: Gpm Fatou Saly-Douté Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit GPM Fatou est un ancien regroupement de femmes qui se sont rapprochées à travers une formation qu’elles ont partagée ensemble. Elles viennent pour la seconde fois solliciter un crédit de 990000F CFA pour améliorer leur activité.
La présidente, la dame Amy, mariée et mère de  5 enfants dont l’ainé à 22 ans et étudie au lycée et le cadet, 6 ans. Elle s’active dans la vente de tissus teints et de chaussures où elle a une expérience de 4 ans. Elle place sa marchandise par tontine et récupère par jour.
Elle participe à la gestion de la maison en s’occupant de la scolarité de ses enfants. 
Comme projet futur, il veut ouvrir une mercerie.
texts.en:
The GPM Fatou loan group is a former group of women who have come together from training that they received together. They come for a second time to ask for a loan of 990,000 francs CFA in order to improve their businesses. 

The president [of the group], Amy, is married and a mother of five children. The oldest child is 22 years old and studies at high school and the youngest is six years old. 

Amy has been selling dyed fabrics and shoes for four years. She distributes her merchandise among several savings groups, and once a day she goes around to collect [remaining merchandise or money earned, or both].

Amy helps to take care of her household and provides for her children's schooling.

As a future project, she would like to open a haberdashery shop.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabrics and shoes to resell

loans.name: Soukeyna

texts.fr: Madame Soukeyna est une brave femme qui est agée de 41ans et évolue dans l'aviculture depuis plus de 2ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont le plus grand a 20ans et le plus petie 3ans. Elle prend en charge les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et l'scolarité de ses enfants. Soukeyna commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h. Elle sollicite ce prêt d'un montant de 100000F pour acheter des poussins, les élever et les revendre. Elle souhaite à l'avenir ouvrir un autre poulailler et augmenter ses revenus
texts.en:
Ms. Soukeyna is a good and honest woman, 41 years old, who has been working in poultry farming for over two years. She is a married mother of five children, of whom the oldest is 20, and the youngest is 3. Ms. Soukeyna takes care of the day-to-day expenses of her family and her children's schooling costs. Her day begins at 8 AM and ends at 6 PM. 

She is requesting this loan in the amount of 100,000 francs to purchase chicks to raise and resell. For the future, she would like to start another chicken coup and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed, and vaccine to raise and sell chickens

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy is a 61-year-old married woman. She has five children with ages ranging from 18 to 42 years old. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a grocery store where she sells fruits, tomatoes, and onions. She has been involved in this business for 12 years. Her business is located in a potential area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be financial constraints. She will use the KES 60,000 loan to add stock of fruits, tomatoes, and onions to sell. Her business goal is to be financially stable within five years.

loans.use: to buy more fruits, tomatoes, and onions to sell

loans.name: Francisco Jesus

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 22 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Francisco no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver partidos de futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Francisco trabaja como chofer de mototaxi brindando servicios de transporte en su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de pasajeros.
Francisco se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general que necesita su mototaxi, de esta manera Francisco tendrá su herramienta de trabajo en mejores condiciones y podrá atender a mas pasajeros, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de temer su casa propia y una gran familia.
texts.en:
Francisco, 22, is single and lives in the city of Pisco with his parents and siblings.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who is determined to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very early age to help his parents, Francisco was unable to get the professional training he so desires.  In his free time he enjoys watching soccer games and sometimes cooks a delicious "Arroz Chaufa" (fried rice) to share with family.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Francisco works as a motortaxi driver providing transport services in his city.  He works an average 12 hours a day and believes business is going well because he is dependable and knows where to find the most passengers.

Francisco is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help he will be able to repair his vehicle and give it the maintenance it needs.  His work tool will be in the best condition possible so he can attend to more passengers.  This will allow him to continue working and striving to reach his goal which is to have his own house and a large family one day.

loans.use: To repair and maintain his motortaxi.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is married and has four children. She has received schooling through the middle school level. Vivian produces and sells cassava dough and prepares gari at Wegbe, Hohoe, which she has done for eight years. After harvesting mature cassava roots, the roots are peeled and washed and then sent to the mill to be milled into dough or grated. Then she puts the dough in a sack and places heavy stones on it to press it and let the starch drain out of the dough for two or three days. 

Her husband is a farmer. Vivian uses her income to help her husband with feeding the family. Vivian will use the loan to buy acres of cassava and pay laborers to assist in harvesting (which involves pulling the roots out of the ground by hand). With the new profits from her expanded business, Vivian plans to save to help her increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy acres of cassava and pay laborers to assist in the harvest

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is seamstress from Santrokofi, Hohoe. Grace has received education to the junior high school level. She is married and has 1 child. Her husband is a farmer. Grace has been a seamstress for 5 years now. She helps out with the basic needs of the home. Her loan will be used to buy cloth and fabrics for her customers, and zippers, and thread. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save so she can acquire an electric sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy cloth and fabrics for her customers, and zippers, and thread.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys is married and has 3 children. She has received schooling through to middle school. Gladys sells provisions in Santrokofi, Hohoe, and has done so for the past 10 years. Her husband is a chain saw operator. Gladys uses her income to give support to her husband in all the financial needs of the home. Gladys will use the loan to purchase cans of milo, tin fishes, biscuits, assorted soap, and milk. With the new profits from her expanded business, Gladys plans to save to enhance her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase cans of milo, tin fishes, biscuits, assorted soap, and milk.

loans.name: Oyie

texts.en: Oyie sells food stuffs in Santrokofi, Hohoe. Oyie has received an education to the middle school level. She is widow and has 1 child. Oyie has been selling food stuffs for the past 12 years to support herself and her family even before she got married. She is responsible for her general upkeep and that of her child and her elder sisters who are old and can’t work. Her loan will be used to buy bananas, plantain and other foodstuffs from the local farmers to sell in the cities and other larger communities around where she lives. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards her child’s schooling and help her to continue to be in business.

loans.use: to buy bananas, plantain and other foodstuffs from the local farmers.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a food vendor who cooks and sells Waakye, a local Ghanaian rice dish, in Santrokofi, Hohoe Township. Waakye is a very popular Ghanaian food. It is often eaten as breakfast, lunch or supper with macaroni, wele (cow skin), gari, salad with pepper sauce, tomatoes sauce, fish, or meat. To prepare her Waakye, Victoria gets beans, rice, and colored leaves from the market. She cooks the beans until they become tender and adds the colored leaves to give them a reddish color. Then, she adds the rice to the bean mixture. She cooks the rice and beans until they become tender to eat.
She is married and has 2 children with her husband who works in the security field. Victoria has been selling Waakye for the last 4 years, when she realized that the family would not be able to survive on her husband’s salary alone. She is responsible for assisting her husband with the basic needs of the home. Her loan will be used to buy bags of beans, rice, frozen fish, and crates of eggs. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans, rice, frozen fish, and crates of eggs.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is a petty trader at Santrokofi, Hohoe. Mercy has received a junior high school education.  She is married and has four children with her husband who is a peasant farmer. Mercy has been into petty trading for six years. She supports her husband with some basic financial needs of the home. Her loan will be used to buy cartons of tinned tomatoes, canned fish, smoked fish, spices and rice. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save to acquire a shop soon and to boost her working capital

loans.use: to buy cartons of tinned tomatoes, canned fish, smoked fish, spices and rice

loans.name: Doris

texts.en: Doris is seamstress in Santrokofi, Hohoe Township. Doris has received an education but only to the junior high school level. During her studies she began to have a passion for fashion designing. She is single and has been a seamstress for only 2 years now. She is responsible for all her financial needs and that of her younger siblings. Her loan will be used to buy zippers, thread, and linen. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save towards her future.

loans.use: to buy zippers, thread, and linen.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Luis no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasar gratos momentos con su familia, incluso a veces cocina un riquísimo Pollo Frito para compartir con ellos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luis trabaja como serenazgo en una empresa municipal de su ciudad, el brinda servicios de vigilancia y seguridad ciudadana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea ponerle piso y cercar la parte trasera su casa con materiales adecuados y resistente, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda adecuada, que brinde mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis, 21, lives in the city of Chincha with his wife and small son who he loves dearly and who are his main motivation in life.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who, together with his wife, works hard to provide for his family.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very young age, Luis was unable to get a Business Administration degree as he would have liked.  In his free time he enjoys spending time with his family and sometimes even cooks a delicious fried rice to share with them.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Luis works as a security guard for a municipal company in his city.  He provides surveillance and citizen safety, working an average ten hours a day.  He enjoys his work and believes it is going well because he works hard and is kind to others.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to you he will be able to renovate his house.  He wants to install floor covering and put up a fence around the back of the house using adequate, strong materials.  This will allow him to continue working and striving toward his goal of having a nicer home to provide more safety and well being for his family.

loans.use: To renovate his house.

loans.name: America Esther

texts.es:
America es una mujer de 42 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad  de Pisco, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, America no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, America trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días ocupando un pequeño espacio en su vivienda y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, America se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
America se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea comprar materiales de construcción, como cemento, ladrillos, arena, pintura y otros, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder construir, tarrajear y pintar su vivienda, de esta manera America tendrá su vivienda en condiciones adecuadas y seguras, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de salir adelante.
texts.en:
America, 42, is single and lives in the city of Pisco.  She is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very young age to help her parents, America was unable to get a Business Administration degree as she would have liked.  In her free time she enjoys sports and sometimes cooks a delicious chicken and rice to share with family.

On her own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, America runs a small grocery business out of her home where she works an average ten hours a day.  She enjoys her work and believes business is going well because of her low prices and kindness to her customers.

America is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help she will be able to renovate her house.  She wants to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, sand, paint and other supplies so she can do some construction work, cover the walls and paint her house.  This will make America's house safer and give it the right conditions for her to continue working and striving toward her goal of making a good living.

loans.use: To renovate her house.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is married and has three children. She has received schooling to the primary level. Joyce is a fishmonger and a petty trader at Santrokofi, Hohoe. She has done this business for 15 years now. Her husband is into carpentry. Joyce uses her income to support her husband with some of the financial needs of the home and to help feed the family. Joyce will use the loan to buy different types of fish. With the new profits from her expanded business, Joyce intends to save to enable her to continue to help her husband give a better education to their children.

loans.use: to buy different types of fish to sell

loans.name: Eddy Alfonso

texts.es:
Eddy  es un hombre de 28 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar desde muy joven, no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Eddy trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindado servicios de transporte, él trabaja todos los días y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Eddy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general que necesita su mototaxi para estar operativo, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa de transporte y casa propia.
texts.en:
Eddy, 28, is single and lives in the city of Ica with his parents and siblings who he adores and who are his main motivation in life.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very young age, he was unable to get professional training as he would have liked.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer and sometimes he cooks a delicious "Carapulcra con Sopa Seca" stew to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Eddy works as a motortaxi driver providing transportation services.  He works every day for about ten hours.  He enjoys his work and believes it is going well because of his dedication and kindness to customers.

Eddy is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help he will be able to repair his vehicle and give it the proper maintenance to keep it in running order.  This will allow him to continue working and striving toward his goal of having his own transportation business and own home one day.

loans.use: To repair and maintain his motortaxi.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina es una mujer de 52 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para ellos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Angelina no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Enfermería, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Angelina trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas, como gaseosas, agua mineral y otras, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Angelina se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea comprar madera, pintura y otros materiales, los cuales le servirán para hacer refacciones en su hogar, de esta manera Angelina y su familia podrán contar con mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia distribuidora.
texts.en:
Angelina, 52, lives in the city of Pucalpa with her three children who she adores and who are her main motivation in life.  She is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who dedicates all her efforts to providing for her family, since she is both mother and father to them.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work from a very young age, Angelina was unable to get a nursing degree as she would have liked.  In her free time she likes to cook a delicious chicken and rice to share with her family

On her own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Angelina runs a small business selling beverages such as sodas, mineral water, etc.  She works an average 12 hours a day and believes things are going well because of her low prices and kindness to customers.

Angelina is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to you she will be able to renovate her house.  She wants to buy wood, paint and other materials to make some repairs at home, which will give Angelina and her family more safety and well being.  This is so she can continue working hard toward her goal of having her own dealership.

loans.use: To renovate her house.

loans.name: Rolando Alcides

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre de 45 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Rolando no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Mecánica Automotriz que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Rolando trabaja en su pequeño negocio de duplicado de llaves, él trabaja todos los días en su pequeño modulo brindando sus servicios y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Rolando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de cocina, la cual le servirá de mucho ya que actualmente solo cuenta con una pequeña parrilla que funciona con carbón, de esta manera Rolando y su familia podrán preparar de manera adecuada y segura sus alimentos, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia ferretería.
texts.en:
Rolando is 45 years old and lives in the city of Pucallpa with his wife and four children, whom he loves and who are his main reason for living.  Rolando is friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic and has a great desire to get ahead in life.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and because he had to work from a very young age, Rolando was not able to study to be a mechanic as he had wanted.  In his spare time, Rolando likes to play football with his friends and, on occasion, he likes to prepare a delicious “arroz con pollo” (a traditional, Peruvian dish made with chicken and rice) to share with his family.

Through his own initiative, and with a lot of determination and dedication, Rolando has a small business cutting keys.  He works every day at his small stall providing his services.  He does this for around ten hours a day.  He likes his job and thinks it is going well because of his good prices and because of the friendly service he offers.

Rolando is very grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help provided, he will be able to buy a cooker.  This will help him a lot as he currently only has a small grill which runs on coal.  With the cooker, Rolando and his family will be able to prepare adequate meals and have a sure way to cook.  Rolando will continue working and putting in the effort to achieve his great dream of having his own DIY shop.

loans.use: to buy a cooker.

loans.name: Wilber

texts.es:
Wilber es un hombre de 44 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y sus hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Wilber no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación,  Wilber trabaja en su pequeño negocio de vena de menestras, como frejoles, pallares, lentejas y otros, el trabaja en un pequeño puesto de ventas y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Wilber se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de menestras para abastecer su negocio, de esta manera Wilber podrá atender a más clientes, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño te ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Wilber is 44 years old and lives in the city of Chincha with his wife and children, whom he loves and are his main reason for living. Wilber is friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic and, together with his wife, they put in all their efforts to helping their family move forward. Unfortunately, due to a lack of money and because he had to work from a young age, Wilber was not able to study to become a professional.  In his free time, Wilber likes to prepare a delicious “arroz con pollo” (a traditional, Peruvian dish made with chicken and rice) to share with his family.
Through his own initiative, and with a lot of determination and dedication, Wilber works with his business selling items such as beans, Lima beans, lentils and more.  He works at a small stall for around ten hours every day and he thinks things are going well for him because of his good prices and because he treats others well.
Wilber is very grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help provided, he will be able to buy stock in bulk to stock up his business. With more stock, Wilber will be able to tend to more customers and will continue working and putting in the effort to achieve his great dream of expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Amirali

texts.ru: Амирали со своей семьей проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 55 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей - трое сыновей и трое дочерей. Все его дети обзаведены семьями. Двое его сыновей работают за пределами страны, а третий сын работает в поликлинике медбратом. Его жена работает в сельской школе уборщицей. Амирали имеет средне-техническое образование. Он занимается куплей и продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Амирали занимается этим делом в течение 4-х лет. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков с целью их дальнейшего откорма и продажи. В будущем Амирали хочет расширить свою деятельность и за счет прибыли купить автомашину.
texts.en:
Amirali and his family live in the Hamadoni region.  He is 55 years old, married, and has six children:  three sons and three daughters.   All of his children have their own families.  Two of his sons work abroad, and the third son works as a nurse in a policlinic.  His wife works as a cleaning woman in the village school.  Amirali has a secondary technical education, but he earns a living by buying and selling cattle.  He has been doing this for four years.

He is taking out this loan to buy bull-calves, which he will fatten and sell.  Amirali wants to expand his business in the future and to buy a car with the profits.

loans.use: to buy cattle for resale

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур неженатый молодой человек. Ему 28 лет. Он живет с родителями в районе Хамадони. Его брат занимается торговлей овощей на рынке. Сам Баходур зарабатывает на жизнь предоставляя услуги такси. У него среднее техническое образование. Баходур уже год как работает в сфере  маршрутного такси. Он обеспечивает семью за счет полученного дохода от деятельности. Баходур берет кредит для закупа запасных частей для ремонта своей автомашины, на котором он развозит пассажиров. За счет прибыли с деятельности он планирует провести ремонт в доме.
texts.en:
Bahodur is a young bachelor at 28 years old.  He lives with his parents in the Hamadoni region and he has a secondary technical education.  His brother sells vegetables at the market.  Bahodur earns his own living by providing taxi services.  He drives a fixed route and has been doing this for a year.  He uses the money he earns to support his family.

Bahodur is taking out this loan to buy repair parts for his taxi.  He plans to use the profits from his work to do home repairs.

loans.use: to buy repair parts for his taxi

loans.name: Jum'ahon

texts.ru: Чумъахон житель района Хамадони. Ему 21 год. Он холост и живет вместе с родителями. Его отец работает за пределами страны, а мать домохозяйка. После окончания школы в возрасте 18 лет Чумаъхон приступил к собственному бизнесу.  Он в своем районе открыл дилерский центр и уже 3 года как работает в этой сфере обслуживания. Он занимается продажей сим-карт и пополнением телефонных счетов. Чумаъхону в бизнесе помогает кузен. Сейчас Чумъахон берет кредит для расширения деятельности. В будущем он планирует открыть еще один дилерский центр.
texts.en:
Jum'ahon is a resident of the Hamadoni region.  He is 21 years old, a bachelor, and lives with his parents.  His father works abroad and his mother is a homemaker.  After he finished school at 18 years old, Jum'ahon started his own business in their neighborhood.  He sells SIM cards and refills mobile phone accounts.  He has been in this field for three years.  Jum'ahon's cousin helps him with the business.

Now, Jum'ahon is taking out this loan to expand his business.  He is planning to open a second store in the future.

loans.use: to buy an inventory of SIM cards

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 44 years old, married and the mother of three children. For the last ten years, she has earned a living by selling farm produce in Mpeketoni, Lamu. She earns a monthly profit of 10,900 Kenyan shillings (KES).

Elizabeth was introduced to KADET Ltd. by a credit officer and is applying for her third loan of 20,000 KES to buy seeds, some fertilizer and other farm inputs needed for her business. She will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay school fees for her children as well as expand her farming activities. 

Her goal for the future is to venture into mixed farming with a view to increasing her income so as to help improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs for her business

loans.name: Agueda De Jesus

texts.es:
Agueda de Jesús, mayor de edad madre soltera, originaria de león, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Esta mujer se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsables, de buenas costumbres, la cual tuvo que trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.


Gracias a su espíritu   y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de pollo entero y por libras, ubicado en su casa de habitación, la foto se obserba  a la Sra ofreciendo sus productos donde mantiene el pollo para ofrecer a sus clientes. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de pollos entero y menudeado para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diaria actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto. Águeda agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Águeda de Jesús is an older adult, single mother from León, a place located in the western part of the country.  She’s noted for being hardworking, responsible, of good habits; she had to start working at an early age to help with household expenses.

Thanks to her spirit and the drive to move forward, her economic activity is selling whole chickens and chicken parts.  The activity is home-based.  In the photo she can be seen with her freezers where she stores the chicken to sell to her customers.  

The objective of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business with the purchase and sale of whole chicken and chicken parts so that in the not too distant future she can earn higher income.

She spends about 10 hours daily in her business and she does so gladly.  Águeda is very grateful to Kiva lenders who provide support to people of scarce resources and to poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can have a dignified way of earning a living.

loans.use: to buy whole chickens and chicken parts.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is from Nakuru and has a spices business. He used his previous loan amount to buy more stock of spices to sell and it was very profitable.

He has applied for his third loan from KADET LTD to buy more fruit for sale and also pay school fees for his children. This current loan has been applied as a rider loan with the previous loan as it is to be used to cater more for his children's school fees. With the anticipated profit, he hopes to buy a cow.

He hopes to open a grocery in the near future and educate his children.

loans.use: To  buy more fruit  for sale and pay school fees.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a married lady aged 35 years old and a mother of three children aged 13, 10, and 7 years old. She operates a boutique shop in the Cheptongei area and has been running the business for four years earning a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She learned about KADET LTD from a KADET LTD credit officer. She has borrowed her first loan of KES.10,000 from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to purchase fabrics for dressmaking. 

The anticipated profit will be used to pay school fees for her schoolgoing children. Her dreams is to improve her living standards and own her residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for dressmaking

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a 29-year-old married gentleman and a father of one three-year-old child. He sells shoes and clothing on the outskirts of the town of Narok. 

He learned about KADET LTD from a church member who is already being funded by KADET LTD. Samuel has acquired his second loan of KES 40,000 to purchase and transport bales of shoes and clothing for resale. Samuel will use the proceeds to expand his business. 

His dream is to improve the living standards of his humble family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and clothing for resale.

loans.name: Surmakhon

texts.ru: Сурмахон женщина, которая всегда старается улучшить условию домохозяйства. Ей 62 года. Она вдова и имеет 8 детей. Все дети совершеннолетние. Для обеспечения 8 детей, ей не обходимо было организовать и развивать бизнес и получать доход, который будет удовлетворять потребность семьи. Она более 27 лет занимается купле продажей женской и детской нижнего белья и одежды. Она реализует свой товар на местном рынке. Сурмахон очень вежливо относится с клиентами и старается всё больше привлечь клиентов. Она планирует купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  1300 долларов США для покупки товара для нового сезона. Сурмахон является повторной клиенткой ИМОН и имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Surmakhon is a woman who always tries to improve the quality of her situation.  She is 62 years old, a widow, and has eight children--all of whom are grown.  Surmakhon organized and developed a business out of necessity to provide for eight children.  The income met the family's needs.  For more than 27 years, she has sold women's and children's underwear and clothing at a local market.  Surmakhon very politely works with her customers and tries to increase her client base.  She plans to buy inventory for the new season and she doesn't have the means to do so.  She is asking for a loan of 1,300 USD to buy seasonal clothing.  She is a repeat client of IMON and has a good credit history.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy women and children clothes for new season

loans.name: Raphael

texts.en:
Raphael is 25 years old, married to Ruth, and blessed with two children aged five and two years, respectively. He is a mechanic and works in his own garage repairing motor vehicle and motorcycles, a business he started four years ago. He earns a monthly income of 30,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).

He has requested a third loan of 80,000 KES to purchase motor vehicle and motorcycle spare parts to facilitate his work. 

The profit he earns will help him expand his workshop and support his family. His dream is to prosper in his business and lead a better life.

loans.use: To purchase motor vehicle and motorcycle spare parts to facilitate his work.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 34 years old and married with 3 children. She has a retail shop in Nairobi's Eastlands area which she has been running for the past 6 years and it has been profitable.

This is her first loan term with KADET LTD and she plans to use the amount to buy more stock of goods for sell. These include sugar, rice, cooking fat, flour as well as eggs and milk.She will use the generated profits to buy more stock.

She hopes to grow her business and open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy more stock of goods for resale

loans.name: Zaynura

texts.ru: Зайнура очень умная женщина, которая живет вместе семьей в старом доме, который не отвечает стандартам жилья и она срочно должна отремонтировать свой дом. Ей 43 года, она замужем за человека, который не смог найти подходящею работу на родине и уехал в Российскую Федерацию и там он зарабатывает. Дети всегда просят родителей отремонтировать их дом, но их доход не достаточно для этого. Зайнура более чем 3 лет работает в государственной организации. Ее зарплата не хватает для ремонта. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000  сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zaynura is a very intelligent woman, who lives together with her family in an old house. Her home does not meet the standards of living, and she urgently needs to repair it.  She is 43 years old, and is married to a man who could not find suitable work in his homeland and went abroad to Russia in order to work.  The children are always asking their parents to repair their house, but their income is not sufficient to do this.  Zaynura has been working for a government organization for more than three years.  Her income is not enough to pay for the repairs.  She is asking for a loan of 3,000 somons for the purchase of building materials to repair her home.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement and paint for repairing her house

loans.name: Tania

texts.es:
Tania tiene 23 años de edad, es soltera y vive en compañía de sus padres.Tania se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, hace tres años que viene dedicándose a esta actividad aunque se inicio sola buscando una manera de percibir ingresos para ayudar a su familia con los gastos de su hogar, ahora es un gran apoyo para sus padres. Para empezar con este negocio necesitaba capital y como en ese entonces no contaba con liquidez económica, tuvo que realizar varios trabajos extras para obtener un ahorro , luego con el apoyo de sus padres pudo establecer su actividad laboral,ahora tiene una variedad de productos en stock, y para conseguirlo tuvo que esforzarse mucho, teniendo que buscar clientes, salir a ofrecer sus productos y tener que cobrarles todos los días, hasta hacerse conocida. Ahora con la experiencia y la lista de clientes que tiene ha visto mejoras en su negocio, percibiendo más ingresos,en un futuro con las ganancias que obtiene espera abrir un local exclusivamente para la venta de productos de belleza y cosméticos, para que aumente sus ventas e incremente sus ingresos.Este es su primer crédito con Kiva, y esta muy agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para mejorar sus ventas.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.1500 soles  comprará cosméticos para surtir su negocio y dinamizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Tania is 23 years old, single and lives with her parents.  She makes a living selling cosmetics, having started the work three years ago.  In the beginning, Tania was only looking for an income to support her parents with household costs but it is now a huge help to the family.  To start the business, Tania needed capital and, given that she didn't have any at the time, she took on various jobs so that she could save up.  Later, with her parent's support, she was able to start her business.  Now she has a variety of stock but she had to put a lot of effort into the business - she had to look for customers, go out to sell her products and customers had pay cash until she became known in the area.  Now with experience and a good customer base, Tania has seen improvements in her business.  She is earning more and, in the future, she hopes to be able to open her own shop to sell beauty products and cosmetics.  That way, her sales would increase and so would her income.  This is Tania's first loan with Kiva and she is very grateful for the financial support being provided to help her improve her sales.

Tania will buy cosmetics to stock up her business and improve her sales with the 1500 Nuevo Soles loan.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as creams, perfumes and more.

loans.name: Ahliddin

texts.ru: Ахлиддин холостой молодой человек. Ему 27 лет. Он живет вместе с родителями в районе Джиликуль в южной части страны. У него большая и дружная семья. Он имеет среднее образование. Он добрый и предприимчивый человек. Ахлиддин занимается земледелием. Он арендует земельный участок, на котором выращивает пшеницу. Ахлиддин занимается земледельческой деятельностью на протяжении пяти лет. Он берет кредит для приобретения минерального удобрения на обработку земли, чтобы получить богатый урожай пшеницы. Ахлиддин за счет прибыли с продажи урожая хочет жениться.
texts.en:
At 27 years old, Ahliddin is a young bachelor.  He lives with his parents in the Jilikul region in the southern part of the country.  Theirs is a big, closely knit family.  Ahliddin has a secondary technical education.  He is a kind and entrepreneurial man.  Ahliddin is in the farming business.  He rents land where he grows wheat.  Ahliddin has been in this business for five years.  

Ahliddin is taking out this loan to buy mineral fertilizers for working into the soil in order to have a bountiful harvest.  Ahliddin wants to use the profits from this harvest to get married.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer for wheat

loans.name: Nusratulo

texts.ru: Нусратуло женатый молодой мужчина. Ему 28 лет и у него двое маленьких детей. Он со своей семьей проживает в районе Руми. Его жена домохозяйка. Нусратуло является единственным кормильцем в семье. Он занимается растениеводством. Нусратуло опытный дехканин. Он на протяжении 8 лет занимается посевом арбуза, семечки и хлопка. Нусратуло обеспечивает семью за счет земледелия. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа минерального удобрения, чтобы обработать землю и получить хороший урожай. В дальнейшем Нусратулло хочет расширить свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Nusratulo is a young married man.  He is 28 years old and has two young children.  He and his family live in the Rumi region.  His wife is a homemaker.  Nusratulo is the family's only breadwinner.  He is a farmer and very experienced.  He has been growing watermelon, sunflower, and cotton for eight years.  He supports his family with the profits from his farming.  

Nusratulo is requesting a loan to buy mineral fertilizer to work into the soil so he will have a good harvest.  He hopes to expand his farming business in the future.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer for his watermelon, cotton, and sunflower crops.

loans.name: Oblokul

texts.ru:
Облокул мужчина, в возрасте 48 лет, живет в сельской местности Дж. Расловского района. Он женат, имеет троих детей, двоих сыновей и дочку. Его жена Хочалой днем работает в дехканском хозяйстве, а вечером и утром ухаживает за КРС, доит корову, откармливает коров и  быков. Облокул помогает жене при откармливания КРС, но его основная работа является выращивание сельхоз продукции. Имеется земельный участок 3 га, в которой выращивается пшеница. Старший сын находится на заработках в РТ. Младший сын дома помогает отцу и матерей. 
Но основной доход у них от откорма скота.  Поэтому Облокул   намерен  увеличить  стадо и приобрести скот. Но чтобы купить скот у них на руках нету достаточно денежных средств поэтому Облокул обратился в организацию Арванд за кредитом.  Он надеется, что  расширит количество коров для получения больше прибыли. Облокул заранее благодарен  таким организациям как "Арванд" за  финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Oblokul is a 48 year old man and lives in the J. Raslov region.  He is married and has three children:  two sons and a daughter.  His eldest son works abroad, but his youngest son lives at home and helps his parents.  Oblokul's wife, Hochaloi, works on the farm during the day, and in the morning and evening, she feeds and takes care of their cattle and milks their cows.  Oblokul helps his wife feed the cattle, but his main job is tending to their crops.  They have three hectares of land where they grow wheat, but their primary source of income is from raising cattle.  Because of this, Oblokul wants to buy cattle to increase the size of their herd, however they don't have enough cash on hand to do this.

And so, Oblokul has applied to MDO Arvand for a loan.  He hopes to buy cows in order to earn more profits.  Oblokul is thankful in advance to organizations such as MDO Arvand for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is a petty trader located at Santrokofi, Hohoe. Margaret has received education up to  the middle school level. She is married and has 5 children. Her husband is a retired teacher. Margaret has been in the petty trading business for about 10 years now. She is responsible for providing food in the home and helps with other basic financial needs. Her loan will be used to buy groundnut paste, smoked fish, wale (cow skin), grains, tinned tomatoes and yam tubers. She hopes to save and use the new profits from her business to enhance her working capital.

loans.use: to buy groundnut paste, smoked fish, wale (cow skin), grains, tinned tomatoes and yam tubers.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a food vendor who prepares and sells bank, a local dish, at Santrokofi, Hohoe Township. Esther has received education up to the junior high school level. She is married and has 3 children. Her husband is a farmer. Esther has been selling banku for 2 years now. 

To prepare banku, she first prepares corn dough (maize that has been milled and left for a day) and cassava dough. She mixes the cassava and corn dough and cooks them into a porridge-like consistency. To get the right consistency, she has to stir the mixture on a hot firewood stove. The texture of banku has to be fine, but firm. The accompanying dish can be any kind of soup or sauce such as palm nut soup, groundnut soup, peanut soup, okra soup or hot pepper sauce with fish of any kind. The most popular side dish for banku is okra stew. 

Esther assists her husband in providing food for their family. Her loan will be used to buy bags of cassava dough, maize, palm nut fruit, okra and fish. She plans to save from the profits from her expanded business and reinvest to increase her working capital so that she can operate from a bigger place.

loans.use: to buy bags of cassava dough, maize, palm nut fruit, okra and fish.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married and has 4 children. She has received schooling through senior high school. Elizabeth operates a beauty salon at Ve-Agbome, Hohoe, which she has done for the past 10 years to support her husband who is a local mason. Elizabeth uses her income to help provide for the home. 

Elizabeth will use the loan to purchase different kinds of hair relaxers, shampoos, conditioners and weave-in hair extensions. With the new profits from her business, Elizabeth plans to save to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of hair relaxers, shampoos, conditioners and weave-in hair extensions.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is married and has 4 children. She has received schooling through the middle school level. Constance sells provision in Ve-Agbome, Hohoe Township, which she has done for 7 years now to support her family. Her husband is an auto mechanic. Constance uses her income to assist her husband with paying utility bills and feeding the family. 

Constance will use the loan to purchase cartons of biscuits, Milo, Nido, cooking oil, assorted soap, and torch lights. With the new profits from her  business, Constance plans to save to expand her working capital and enhance her profit.

loans.use: to purchase cartons of biscuits, Milo, Nido, cooking oil, assorted soap, and torch lights.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is a petty trader located at Santrokofi, Hohoe. Vivian has received education but only through junior high school.  She is married and has 4 children. Her husband is a teacher. 

Vivian has been a petty trader for 10 years now. She supports her husband with some basic financial needs for the home. Her loan will be used to purchase bags of cassava dough, corn dough and palm fruits from the local farmers for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to save so she can continue to support her husband and provide for the home.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cassava dough, corn dough and palm fruits from the local farmers for resale.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is a widow and has four children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Comfort is a successful businesswoman. She sells cooking ingredients in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about four years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Comfort uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Comfort will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of cooking ingredients, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Comfort plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cooking ingredients, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Aba is an entrepreneur. She sells maize. She can be found selling maize in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 12 years. Aba is married and has eight children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her sales normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Aba will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Aba plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Ekua is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough which is wrapped in banana leaves). She usually sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ for six years. Ekua is married and has eight children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Ekua wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. In the long term, Ekua plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Araba

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Araba is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling cassava and palm oil in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for four years. Araba is married and her husband works as a fan milk (ice cream) vendor. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses. 

Araba will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of cassava and palm oil, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Araba plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of cassava and palm oil.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Rebecca is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves). She usually sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ for two years. Rebecca is married and has seven children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Rebecca wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. In the long term, Rebecca plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: pay for the renovation, change of tires, and battery for his taxi.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en:
Aba is divorced and has six children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Aba is a successful businesswoman. She sells palm kernel oil in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 15 years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Aba uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Aba will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of palm fruits, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Aba plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of palm fruits.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Mary is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling cooking ingredients in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for a number of years. Mary is married and has two children. Her husband works as a mason. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Mary wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of cooking ingredients. In the long term, Mary plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Even though Abena grew up in poverty without an education, this has not stopped her from fulfilling her dream of achieving a better life for her and her family. Currently, Abena is an entrepreneur. She sells charcoal in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). Her business enterprise has grown substantially since she began eight years ago. She uses the income from her business to help her husband raise their four children. 

Abena has identified that there are growing demands among consumers’ for her product. Nevertheless she is unable to meet their needs due to her limited inventory capacity. Thus she aims to use her loan to purchase more charcoal to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Abena wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will be given the opportunity to further distance their family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Adwowa

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Adwowa did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Adwowa sells cooked rice and porridge in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about 20 years. She is married to a carpenter, and together they have two children. Adwowa uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. 

Adwowa will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of rice and porridge, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Adwowa wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of rice and porridge.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Ama did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Ama operates a chop bar (small restaurant that sells local dishes) in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about 10 years. As a divorcee with five children, Ama uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. 

Ama will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of ingredients for the local dishes, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Ama wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of ingredients to make local dishes.

loans.name: Adwowa

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Adwowa is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling cassava and bread in Wafkrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for eight years. Adwowa is married and has four children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and paying their children’s school fees. 

Adwowa wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of cassava and bread. In the long term, Adwowa plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Shakuul

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Shakuul is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling groceries in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 10 years. Shakuul is married and has three children. Her husband works as a mason. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. 

Shakuul will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of groceries for resale, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Shakuul plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of groceries for resale.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is divorced and has two children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Theresa  is a successful businesswoman. She sells salted fish in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about two years. As the sole breadwinner in the family, Theresa uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Theresa will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of fish, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Theresa plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of fish, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Arco Iris  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Arco Iris está formado por 13 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, esta parroquia es muy visitada ya que es el mirador de la ciudad en donde se puede observar el esplendor de casi toda las ciudad, cuenta con una hermosa iglesia, varios lugares para disfrutar de su gastronomía y su cultura. Su gente al igual que las socias son personas amables, gentiles y de buen humor, que tienen un objetivo en común el cual es sacar adelante a sus familias y brindarles un mejor futuro, trabajan en diferentes campos como es la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Perla, está en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Arco Iris, propiedad  le gusta la banca comunal por todo ese compañerismo, unión y buen humor que tienen sus compañeras del grupo, los créditos le ayudan a mejorar y crecer en su negocio.
Tiene 31 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad. Su esposo es profesor, la casa en la que vive es propia.

Doña Perla se dedica al comercio informal de bisutería y sandalias, trabaja solo los días de ferias sin un horario fijo, esta actividad le permite tener sus propios ingresos, ayudar a mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar y a su vez cuidar de su familia. 

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió  en la compra de mercadería para su negocio del cual obtuvo buenas ganancias. Su nuevo crédito va a invertir en la compra de nuevos modelos de sandalias y más bisutería porque poco a poco está creciendo en su negocio lo que le llena de satisfacción.
texts.en:
The community bank Arco Iris (Rainbow) is comprised of 13 women members and 1 man who live in the outskirts of the parish of Turi in Cuenca. This parish is often visited as it has a city overlook where you can observe the splendor of almost the whole city. It also has a beautiful church and places to enjoy the gastronomy and culture of the city. The people, like our members, are friendly, kind, and good humored and have a common goal which is to help their families to get ahead and to offer them a better future. They work in different fields such as agriculture, livestock raising, and business, and they maintain the culture and traditions of their people. 
One of the members of this group is Perla. This is her third loan with the Arco Iris community bank and she likes the bank for the fellowship, unity, and good humor of the group members and for the loans that help her to improve and grow her business. She is 31 years old, married, and has two children who are 12 and 8 years old. Her husband is a teacher and the house they live in is their own. 
Perla works in informal business selling costume jewelry and sandals. She works alone on market days without a fixed timetable. This activity enables her to have her own income and helps to improve the stability of the home and, at the same time, helps her to care for her family. 
She used her last loan to buy merchandise for her business so she could make better profits. She will use her new loan to buy new models of sandals and more jewelry as, little by little, her business is growing and this fills her with satisfaction.

loans.use: to buy sandals and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Efua is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling groceries in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for two years. Efua is married and has three children. Her husband is currently unemployed. As the sole breadwinner in the family, the proceeds from her business normally go towards covering the entire family’s general expenses. Efua wants to use her loan to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of groceries. In the long term, Efua plans to reinvest future profits into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Jessenia Marilyn

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar vive la señora Jessenia, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos  de 13, 12 y 7 años que estudian los  mayores en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica en Manta.

Doña Jessenia tiene un negocio en su casa en el cual vende pollos a la brasa, esto lo realiza de viernes a domingo, pero los otros días también por las tardes vende pan de almidón y el delicioso morocho, bebida que es muy consumida por sus clientes, trabaja todos los días desde las 16h00 hasta las 21h00, sus hijos le ayudan y su esposo cuando llega de su trabajo. Lleva más de 10 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pollos, aliños y otros víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Lleva 3 años en el Banco Comunal y  le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es que nunca les falte nada a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The members of the community bank Madres Unidas (Mothers United) meet every two weeks in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for it's great diversity of local products such as, for example, the straw hats that are well-known within and beyond the country. 
Jessenia lives in this place. She is 33 years old, married, and has three children from this marriage who are 13, 12, and 7 years old. The older children are in high school and the younger is in elementary school. Her husband works in a factory in Manta. 
Jessenia has a business in her house where she sells grilled chicken. She does this from Friday through Sunday but, on the other days, in the afternoons, she sells yuca bread and the delicious corn drink morocho, a drink that her clients consume a lot of. She works everyday from 4:00pm until 9:00pm. Her children help her as does her husband when her arrives home from work. She has been doing this for more than 10 years and is doing well.
She will use this loan to buy chickens, dressings, and other foodstuffs necessary for making her dishes. She has been with the community bank for 3 years and she likes it because of the help that they give along with the loans.
Her dream is for her children to have all that they need.

loans.use: to buy chickens, dressings, and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Although she has received no prior formal education, Ama is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves). She usually sells her ‘Kenkey’ in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Kenkey’ for 30 years. 

Ama is married and has four children. Her husband works as a tyre salesman. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. Ama wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Kenkey’. In the long term, Ama plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the needs of rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Due to difficult circumstances, Aba did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Aba sells charcoal in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about 30 years. As a widow with 4 children, Aba uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. Aba will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of charcoal, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Aba wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of charcoal, which will aid her in improving her overall sales

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Due to difficult circumstances Mercy did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. 

Currently, Mercy sells groceries in Abura Edukrom (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about four years. As a divorcee with five children, Mercy uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. Mercy will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of groceries for resale, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Mercy wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of groceries for resale.

loans.name: Bayarsaikhan

texts.en:
Borrower Bayarsaikhan, 51, is a married man who lives with his two sons and wife. His elder son works as an operator and younger son attends university, while his wife is a storekeeper at a local trade company. Bayarsaikhan is a security professional at local company. 

He bought a new yard for his son recently and he is preparing to build a house for him there. Thus, he needs some construction materials. In the future, his elder son will marry, so he is preparing for his son's wedding, Therefore, Bayarsaikhan is requesting a 3,500,000 MNT loan to carry out this housing project.

loans.use: to purchase necessary housing materials.

loans.name: Diana Elizabeth

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar vive la señora Diana, tiene 22 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen una hija  de 3 años. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica en Manta.

Doña Diana además de ser una gran esposa y madre se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes. Trabaja tres días a la semana más que todo en las mañanas, deja sus productos  a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Ella compra su mercadería en Guayaquil cada vez  que necesita. Este negocio empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco y ahora le permite ganar algo por su cuenta.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva tres ciclos en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias al primer crédito empezó su negocio.
 
Su sueño es darle lo mejor a su pequeña.
texts.en:
